Html:
Hi,

is it possible to make the markers movablae in the WPF versions, so that you can drag and drop a marker?
Ideally there should be a drop-event so that you can handle the new position in the application.

Thanks,

Andreas
i make custommarker dragable in wpf demo, drag'n'drop events you can manage yourself

thanks for your prompt reply! Do you mean that you will change the demo so that they will be dragable or do you mean that they already are? I downloaded the demo earlier today and couldn't drag the custom markers.

Thanks
Wow! Already done! You are amazing! Thanks!!!!
